_comment: __DETAIL__ for hide details while not sneaking
recipe.clayium_modern.CobblestoneGenerat: As you know, a cobblestone generator is consist of water and lava. Clayium's Cobblestone Generator also needs them. If you place both of them next to the machine, it will work.
recipe.clayium_modern.SaltExtractor.desc: A Salt Extractor is used to extract Salt from water. To run the machine, place water next to it.
recipe.clayium_modern.quartz_crucible.de: Quartz Crucible is a device to get the first Silicon Ingot. Throw Impure Silicon Ingots in a Quartz Crucible, wait a while, and throw a String in it. You can process max 9 ingots at once. The process will take 30 seconds per ingot.
recipe.clayium_modern.SolarClayFabricato: Requires an unobstructed view of the sky.
recipe.clayium_modern.clay_tree.descript: A Clay Tree is a good source of Lithium, but it isn't generated in the Overworld. A sapling of Clay Tree is obtained by irradiating a vanilla sapling, planted on the ground, with Clay Laser. The energy value of Clay Laser must be higher than 1000.
recipe.clayium_modern.pure_antimatter.de: Pure antimatter can be obtained by processing antimatter in a CA Reactor.
block.clayium_modern.clay_work_table.too: The first step to Clay Industry.
block.clayium_modern.clay_crafting_board: A convenient version of vanilla Crafting Table.
You can access the content of a nearby chest while using it.
machine.clayium_modern.energetic_clay_co: To obtain the first Energetic Clay.
machine.clayium_modern.centrifuge.toolti: The most important component of the first clay factory.
machine.clayium_modern.clay_buffer.toolt: Transfers items. Acts as an item pipe.
machine.clayium_modern.multi_track_buffe: This buffer's slots are separated into some color groups.
Transfer of items between two Multitrack Buffers
will be performed independently within each color group.
Moreover, this buffer has one filter slot per group.
machine.clayium_modern.salt_extractor.to: Requires CE and water source next to it.
machine.clayium_modern.solar_clay_fabric: Increases the number of compression of clay
Can accept up to Advanced Industrious Clay.
Increases the number of compression of clay
Can accept up to Compressed Energetic Clay.
Increases the number of compression of clay
Can accept up to Quadruple Compressed Energetic Clay.
You can use a lithium ingot instead of
a Triple Compressed Energetic Clay Block.
machine.clayium_modern.clay_fabricator.c: Can accept up to Sextuple Compressed Energetic Clay.
The production speed rate depends on
the clay block's tier and stack size.
machine.clayium_modern.clay_fabricator.u: Mk I is suitable for up to Sextuple Compressed Energetic Clay.
The production speed rate depends on
the clay block's tier and stack size.
machine.clayium_modern.clay_blast_furnac: Recipe tier depends on components' tier.
machine.clayium_modern.clay_interface.to: Requires Synchronous parts to teleport items.
machine.clayium_modern.redstone_proxy.to: Synchronizer is used to apply an RSInterface
machine.clayium_modern.distributor.toolt: Distributes items that pass through itself equally.
machine.clayium_modern.laser_proxy.toolt: Synchronizer is used to apply a Laser Interface
machine.clayium_modern.clay_reactor.tool: Recipe tier depends on components' tier.
Time to craft depends on Laser's strength.
tooltip.clayium_modern.resonator.tooltip: Increases the efficiency of CA machines
block.clayium_modern.energy_storage_upgr: Adds 1 to the number of Energetic Clay
that an adjacent machine can hold.
Adds 3 to the number of Energetic Clay
that an adjacent machine can hold.
Adds 7 to the number of Energetic Clay
that an adjacent machine can hold.
Allows an adjacent machine to hold
a full stack of Energetic Clay.
machine.clayium_modern.ca_reactor.toolti: The Reactor's rank(the mean of the ranks of its components)
determines how much compressed Pure Antimatter it produces.
Place CA Reactor Coils in the shape of a ring,
cover them with CA Reactor Hulls (or Interfaces),
and replace one of the hulls with a CA Reactor Core.
- The number of CA Reactor Hulls >= 50.
- The tiers of Reactor coils (and Interfaces) >= the Reactor Core's.
message.clayium_modern.ca_reactor.no_nea: No coils found near the reactor.
message.clayium_modern.ca_reactor.too_ma: The number of coils must not be higher than %s.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_coil.too: - Its six surfaces must be covered by other blocks.
- The number of adjacent coil must be 2.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.0.t: Requires Mk I or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.1.t: Requires Mk I or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.2.t: Requires Mk II or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.3.t: Requires Mk II or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.4.t: Requires Mk II or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.5.t: Requires Mk II or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.6.t: Requires Mk III or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.7.t: Requires Mk III or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.8.t: Requires Mk III or higher Core and Coils.
block.clayium_modern.ca_reactor_hull.9.t: Requires Mk III or higher Core and Coils.
machine.clayium_modern.waterwheel.toolti: The number of water flow in the area of 3x3x3
machine.clayium_modern.clay_laser.toolti: Laser is used to run Clay Reactor
Laser seems to have some effect on ores and saplings.
Laser irradiation will stop when a redstone signal is applied.
Power emission will stop when a redstone signal is applied.
Edit clayium.cfg to enable recipes for Converters.
item.clayium_modern.clay_spatula.tooltip: Changes a machine's appearance to Pipe.
item.clayium_modern.memory_card.failed: Failed to paste machine IO settings.
item.clayium_modern.memory_card.tooltip3: Shift + Right Click \: Save to memory
item.clayium_modern.direction_memory.too: Used to configure in what direction
an Area Activator aims while using items.
item.clayium_modern.clay_shovel.tooltip: Can dig Clay Ores and increase drops.
item.clayium_modern.clay_pickaxe.tooltip: Can harvest Clay Ores so fast and increase drops.
item.clayium_modern.simple_item_filter.t: You can switch between white/black list.
You can also nest filters by placing them.
item.clayium_modern.item_filter_fuzzy.to: - Matches if there's a shared OreDict
item.clayium_modern.item_filter_unlocali: Matches to the TranslationKey written on the left side of the lang file, such as tile.air.name
Formerly known as Unlocalized Item Filter.
item.clayium_modern.item_filter_registry: Matches to the Item ID (Registry Name), such as minecraft:stone
item.clayium_modern.item_filter_damage_v: This filter interprets the given string as a regex with '^' and '$' at the beginning and end. If the damage value (metadata) of an item matches the regex, the item is accepted. If you simply enter a number, it will only match that value.
item.clayium_modern.item_filter_block_me: This filter interprets the given string as a regex with '^' and '$' at the beginning and end. If the metadata of a placed block (0-15) matches the regex, the filter accepts it. If you simply enter a number, it will only match that value. Note that when filtering items including itemBlocks, this behaves the same as the Damage Value Item Filter. It may be possible to identify the orientation of a block, or a growth stage of a crop.
item.clayium_modern.item_filter_duplicat: Copies a filter on a machine or in another
If you want to append the copied filter
to a machine, shift + r-click it.
item.clayium_modern.clay_steel_pickaxe.t: You can change the mining area mode by right-clicking.
You can set up the mining area by right-clicking Clay Blocks
which are constructed in the shape you need.
item.clayium_modern.clay_steel_shovel.to: You can change the mining area mode by right-clicking.
You can set up the mining area by right-clicking Clay Blocks
which are constructed in the shape you need.
item.clayium_modern.itemInstantTeleporte: Teleports you to the point of impact.
item.clayium_modern.synchronizer.tooltip: Synchronizes Interfaces with machines or buffers.
It enables you to control machines with
or to teleport items via Item Interfaces.
1. R-click the interface with Synchronous Parts.
2. Record the coord of the machine by R-clicking with this.
3. Synchronize the interface by R-clicking with it.
item.clayium_modern.clay_gadget_holder.t: when they are put in this.
item.clayium_modern.gadget_overclocker_m: Shortens each interval time of digging.
Shortens each interval time of placing or digging.
Shortens each interval time of placing or digging.
Shortens each interval time of placing or digging.
item.clayium_modern.clay_core.tooltip1: Expands the capacity of a Storage Container
